translation.请输入待检查数据: Please enter the data to be checked
translation.输入框支持下面几种格式: The input box supports the following formats
translation.支持标准格式的m3u链接，如有多个请用英文逗号做分割符,比如: Supports standard format m3u links, if there are multiple, please use a comma as the separator, for example
translation.支持m3u文件原始内容，类似: Support original content of m3u files, similar to
translation.当前源来自github的iptv-org，如您有相关源链接，请至设置中添加: The current source is from iptv-org on GitHub. If you have relevant source links, please add them in the settings.
translation.当前设置的【后台检查server域名】为: The current setting for 【Background check server domain】 is
translation.对不起，您没有设置【后台检查server域名】，请至设置页面操作后再来查看: I'm sorry, you haven't set the 【Background check server domain】 yet. Please go to the settings page to set it up before checking again.
